paragraphs.body: Oftentimes, stupas are isolated from nearby settlements and constructed in remote locations, such as deep in the mountains or on hilltops. Spirits are likely to frequent these sites due to the strong spiritual energy associated with the landscapes. Several stupas are also used as Avatar Temples and are able to recognize when the Avatar enters the Avatar State in a spiritually strong place.
